shortdesc.ph: Sets the manual focus position of the camera.
Sets the manual focus position of the camera.

p.codeblock: virtual int setCameraFocusPositionInPreview(float positionX, float positionY) = 0;
public abstract int setCameraFocusPositionInPreview(float positionX, float positionY);

section.p: You must call this method after calling . The setting takes effect after the camera is successfully started, that is, when the SDK triggers the callback and returns the local video state as LOCAL_VIDEO_STREAM_STATE_CAPTURING (1). After a successful call, the SDK triggers the callback.
section.note: This method applies to Android and iOS only.

You must call this method after calling . The setting takes effect after the camera is successfully started, i.e., after the SDK triggers the callback and returns the local video state as LOCAL_VIDEO_STREAM_STATE_CAPTURING (1). After successfully calling this method, the SDK triggers the callback.

section.title: Related Callbacks
section.p: After this method is successfully called, the SDK triggers the callback.

plentry.pd: The horizontal coordinate of the touch point in the view.
The vertical coordinate of the touch point in the view.
The horizontal coordinate of the touch point in the view.
The vertical coordinate of the touch point in the view.
